      map.get("country");//国家 map.get("area");//地区 map.get("region");//省份 map.get("city");//市区 "*map.get(county");//地区 map.get("isp");//ISP公司
      java.lang.String getRs(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String params, java.lang.String encoding)
      从url获取结果，得到json串 例如 {"code":0,"data":{"ip":"210.75.225.254","country":"中国","area":"华北", "region":"北京市","city":"北京市","county":"","isp":"电信", "country_id":"86","area_id":"100000","region_id":"110000","city_id":"110000", "county_id":"-1","isp_id":"100017"}}
      User setCityToUser(User userData)
      通过用户ip将对应的城市id和城市名称存入用户
